name: CheqUPI
headline: India's first UPI wallet for foreign nationals and NRIs
description:
Cheq is a modern UPI payments app for NRIs and international citizens visiting India. 
Using Cheq, you can pay digitally at over 55mn+ merchants across India. 
We help tourists avoid ATMs and minimize their foreign exchange costs while in India.

founders.name: Sudhanshu Shekhar, Founder
founders.description:
Building Cheq UPI - A better payments app for foreign nationals and NRIs visiting India.

Previous work experience: Ispirt, Zeta, Headout, Walmart

founders.name: Manish Shukla, Founder
founders.description:
Building Cheq UPI to enhance the digital payment experience of foreign nationals and NRIs

Previous experience: Zeta, Ispirt

## Digital payments for your India tour
Cheq – UPI wallet let’s you pay anywhere in India using your phone through the [UPI Platform](https://www.cheq.money/<https:/www.npci.org.in/what-we-do/upi/product-overview>)
Need help with wallet setup?
[ ![](https://www.chequpi.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/App-Store.png) ](https://www.cheq.money/<https:/apps.apple.com/in/app/cheq-upi-for-foreigners-nris/id1667625083>)
[ ![](https://www.chequpi.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Play-Store.png) ](https://www.cheq.money/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.acecredit.android>)
[ Call: +919845563750 ](https://www.cheq.money/<tel:919845563750>)
![](https://www.chequpi.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/RHHf69ZaiD91Regm8E0jHwM2ew8.svg)
## How it works
Go cashless & navigate India effortlessly – the digital UPI-powered INR wallet designed for foreigners & NRIs
![](https://www.chequpi.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/NFC.png)
## Download CheqUPI app via playstore/appstore
[ Download Cheq ](https://www.cheq.money/<https:/link-to.app/chequpiwebsite>)
![](https://www.chequpi.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/LsnCCMuvtz1tW4XCfEvhXWVEYPQ.png)

[ Our locations ](https://www.cheq.money/<https:/www.chequpi.com/our-locations/>)
![](https://www.chequpi.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Frame-6111.png)
## Load funds from your international bank debit or credit card and pay across 55Million+ merchants in India
## Ready to setup your wallet?
[ Request Callback ](https://www.cheq.money/<https:/zur24d3dbod.typeform.com/to/FhGJ11GL>)
## TOURIST WALLET
## ₹ 999 
billed just once
[ Get Started ](https://www.cheq.money/<#>)
Access these features when you get tourist wallet
  * Scan & pay at 55Mn+m merchants across India
  * Online payments to all digital stores and services
  * Fund addition with your preferred debit/credit card
  * Proactive call support


![](https://www.chequpi.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/3.png)
30 days money back Guarantee 
![](https://www.chequpi.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/2.png)
0 payment charges at all merchants 
![](https://www.chequpi.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/1.png)
No monthly subscription One-time joining fees 
## DEAR TOURISTS, 
## say goodbye to ATM withdrawal fees! 
Add & withdraw funds instantly with your preferred card
Travel securely with less cash in hands
Pay seamlessly at55 million+ merchantsacross India 
## Cheq is super **safe and secure**
**
Your data is encrypted and every transaction happens after a 2FA. Our risk systems block suspicious transactions proactively.
**
**
## People from around the world love us
## When in India, pay like an Indian 
20Mn+ Hotels & stays
12Mn+ Restaurants & cafes
60K+ Fuel stations 
50Mn+ Local stores
1Mn+ Cab services
24K+ Bike & car rentals

With approximately 55 million merchants accepting UPI and nearly a billion transactions per month…

Fintech startup GradRight, artifical intelligence-based startup Kombai, healthtech firm Neurowyzr
[ Read more ](https://www.cheq.money/<https:/vccircle.com/gradrightfour-others-raise-early-stage-funding>)
## Question? We have answers. 
Who can open a Cheq tourist wallet?
Citizens of G20 nations and Non-resident Indian citizens are allowed to open a Cheq tourist wallet. Argentina, Australia, Brazil, Canada, China, France, Germany, India, Indonesia, Italy, Japan, Republic of Korea, Mexico, Russia, Saudi Arabia, South Africa, Türkiye, United Kingdom and United States and European Union
What are the documents required to open a Cheq tourist wallet?
Your passport and Indian VISA are required to open a tourist wallet
Where can I spend using the Cheq tourist wallet?
Tourist wallet can be used to shop at over 50mn+ shops across India. Both online and offline expenses can be managed
What are the charges involved in using this product?
We charge a one-time INR 999 (~$12) joining fee to every customer. This helps us verify your profile and fight fraud. Account top-up and everyday payment facilities are free of charge.
How can I add funds to the Cheq tourist wallet?
1. You can add funds to your tourist wallet via Transcorp branches. They are available in most major cities across India. Branches accept both cash and cards. 2. You can add funds to your tourist wallet via an instant payment gateway. This is the most convenient way to add funds to Cheq wallets
[ Click For More FAQs ](https://www.cheq.money/<https:/www.chequpi.com/faqs/>)

generated_description:
**CheqUPI: Revolutionizing Payments for Foreign Nationals in India**

**Overview:**
CheqUPI, founded in 2021, is India's first UPI wallet tailored specifically for foreign nationals and NRIs. Based in Bengaluru and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, this fintech startup aims to transform the way international visitors transact while in India. With a compact team of 15, CheqUPI is paving the way for seamless digital payments across the subcontinent.

**Mission:**
CheqUPI's mission is straightforward: enable foreign tourists to navigate India's vibrant market without the hassle of ATM withdrawals or exorbitant foreign exchange fees. With CheqUPI, users can pay at over 55 million merchants throughout India using just their phones.

**Key Features:**
- **UPI Payments:** Users can leverage the Unified Payments Interface (UPI) to make transactions effortlessly at a wide array of vendors, including hotels, restaurants, shops, and more.
- **Tourist Wallet:** For a one-time fee of ₹999 (around $12), users can set up a tourist wallet that allows them to manage their payments digitally, avoiding the pitfalls of cash and currency exchanges.
- **Security and Support:** Every transaction is secured with data encryption and two-factor authentication, ensuring users’ safety. CheqUPI also offers proactive support to assist users as they navigate their payment journeys.

**How It Works:**
To start using CheqUPI, foreign nationals must undergo a physical verification process and provide necessary documentation, such as a passport and Indian visa. Once set up, users can load funds onto their wallets via international debit or credit cards, making it a breeze to transact in a cashless manner at millions of points of sale across the country.

**Why Choose CheqUPI?**
1. **Cost-Efficiency:** By minimizing fees associated with cash withdrawals and offering competitive exchange rates, CheqUPI saves money for travelers.
2. **Convenience:** No more hunting for ATMs or worrying about carrying large amounts of cash. Users can pay directly through their mobile phones at places they visit.
3. **Wide Acceptance:** With access to millions of merchants, users can conveniently shop, dine, and explore without barriers.

**Current Progress:**
CheqUPI has gained momentum by participating in significant partnerships, like the one with Transcorp, and has attracted investment funding, including $500k from Y Combinator. This positions CheqUPI not just as a payment solution, but also as a vital player in India’s rapidly evolving fintech landscape.

**Final Thoughts:**
In an age where cashless transactions are becoming the norm, CheqUPI stands out by focusing on a niche audience—the foreign travelers arriving in India. By simplifying payments through a single innovative wallet, it makes saying "goodbye" to bulky cash a reality. If you're planning a trip to India, outfitting yourself with CheqUPI might just make your experience a whole lot smoother.

For more information or to get started, visit their website: [CheqUPI](https://www.cheq.money).
